channel.title: Projects on Erick C. Jones Jr.
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Erick C. Jones Jr.

item.title: 247 Carbon Free Energy Optimization Modeling
item.description: Investigate the effects of 247 Carbon Free Energy with Macro-Energy System Modeling

item.title: EV Batteries for Resilience
item.description: Investigate the secondary uses of EV batteries by recongizing EVs are giant power centers made of batteries that happen to have vehicles on top of them.

item.title: Green Building Lifecycle Optimization
item.description: Improve Green Building Throughout Entire Lifecycle (Design, Building, and Operations)

item.title: Green Warriors Weatherization Program Improvement
item.description: A program to improve the efficiency of the Weatherization Assistance Program in Dallas

item.title: Heat Pump for Energy Efficiency and Climate Change Mitigation
item.description: Investigate how heat pump adoption could affect energy usage and climate impacts.

item.title: Microgrid Automation, Micro-Wind Turbines and Rooftop Solar
item.description: A project to evaluate solar and wind energy production, microgrid controls, and automation

item.title: Agriculture Solar and Desalination Stochastic Investment Optimization
item.description: A Stochastic Optimization scheme balancing food, energy, and water.

item.title: Community Solar for Low-Income Households in the Competitive Market
item.description: Looking for ways to integrate Community Solar for Low-Income Households in the Competitive Market

item.title: COVID-19 AI-Enabled Supply Chain Optimization
item.description: This EAGER award supports fundamental research in technology-enabled supply chain design to effectively deliver therapeutics to at risk populations in an urban setting.

item.title: CCS Infrastructure Planning, SimCCS Improvements and Case Study
item.description: Worked to upgrade the SimCCS framework by adding a temporal element.

item.title: Co-Optimization and Community, Community Solar and RWH
item.description: An Optimization Scheme for Community Solar and RWH

item.title: Shared Autonomous Vehicles Impact on Climate Change Mitigation
item.description: Optimizing Autonomous Shared Transportation and Power System for Climate

item.title: Science in Residence and Planet Texas
item.description: A program to introduce K-12 to the joys of science
